snippet.title: Kingdoms Forlorn Trailer
snippet.description:
Kingdoms Forlorn is an upcoming turn-based first person dungeon crawler developed by a two man team for Android and iOS.  For more info and updates head to Facebook and Twitter. 

Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/Kingdoms-Forlorn-1800153660289870/
Twitter :  https://twitter.com/KingdomsForlorn
